name: Fizh&Chips
description:
This is a game developed by Angel Tenev and Carlos Jimenez Rodriguez

Fizh & Chips is a single player puzzle game based on feeding fish and fighting monsters in your own little aquarium and decorate it!

For Playing you will only use "W,A,S,D" for moving around the crosshair,

Space bar -- for throwing the food for the fizhes and when the Pink Boss Enemy arrives you can use it for killing him and get the reward, targeting on him.

1.-Buy "Fizh" = 100coins

2.- Buy "Tiburón" = 500coins

3.- Buy "Decoration for Aquarium" = 200, per each time you buy it doubles the price.
